about_the_game:
Welcome to BattleTanks - Animal Wars!

Defend the animal world against nefarious moles in a dynamic co-op action game teeming with tanks and animals!

Two unique perspectives!

Seamlessly switch between twin-stick shooter and first-person shooter perspectives!

Campain Mode!

Explore 5 Vibrant Worlds with over 80 Missions, featuring Arena battles, Defense missions, Side-Scroller challenges, and Puzzles!

Challenging Bosses!

Overcome the challenge of five Great Mecha Beasts in your path.

Co-op up to 4 players

Gather your pals and dive into some couch co-op or competitive gaming action!

Arcade Modes!

Go head-to-head with your friends across 11 various arcade challenges such as
Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Destroy Base, Survival, Duel, Bombarding, Crazy Tunnels,
Boss Rush, and more!

Make your own Tank

Make your own unique Tank and use one of 13 deadly weapons!

Key Features

  • Multiple game modes
  • Fun and extremely catchy graphics
  • Unique campaign mode
  • Arcade action modes
  • 3D pixel perfect maps
  • 80+ maps
  • Side scroller stages
  • BOSS fights!
  • Up to 4 players on your couch
  • Fully customizable tanks and weapons
  • Funny heroes and various enemies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: AMD Phenom(tm) 8450 Triple-Core Processor (3 CPUs), ~2.1GHz or Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 470 (1Gb VRAM) / ATI Radeon TM HD 6870 (1Gb VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device

short_description: Welcome to BattleTanks - Animal Wars! Join friends to defend animals from moles in co-op game. Explore 5 worlds with 80+ missions. Face bosses, gather tank parts, and craft your machine. Play with up to 4 friends. Ready to save the world?
